title: Samsung Super Bowl TV deals are ending soon - save $1,000 on 4K and QLED TVs
description: Samsung's Super Bowl TV deals are ending soon, and we're rounded up the best offers on Samsung 4K and QLED TVs.

title: Google Translate will now understand the difference between bass and bass
description: Now understanding context, the new Google Translate will only work with five languages at launch.

title: That dream crypto job offer is probably just malware
description: Fake job offers are now being used by Russian hackers to deliver infostealers.

title: Windows 11 will let you control RGB lighting without the bloatware and I couldn't be happier
description: An upcoming new feature for Windows 11 would allow users to control RGB lighting settings on their PC gaming devices.

title: LibreOffice still thinks it can steal you away from Microsoft 365 or Google Workspace
description: UI tweaks, additional languages, and better Microsoft Office interoperability all come to LibreOffice 7.5.

title: These cheaper AirPods Pro 2 competitors have a High-Res Audio advantage
description: Atlantic Technology’s new wireless earbuds offer active noise-cancelling and aptX Adaptive for High-Res Audio, for less than the price of the high-end competition.

title: Donald Glover's new Prime Video show is a Beyoncé-inspired dark comedy-thriller
description: Swarm, the new horror-thriller series from Donald Glover, lands on Amazon's streaming platform in March.

title: This new "custom" malware hits your device with specially-designed attacks
description: Sometimes it takes screenshots, and sometimes it steals data, it all depends on you, researchers warn.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (February 10)
description: From returning Netflix dramas to the NFL Super Bowl, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Enjoy playing Android games on your PC? Windows 11 just gave them a huge performance boost
description: If you run Android games on your desktop, expect frame rate boosts to the tune of 50%.

title: Cloudflare unveils Mastodon-compatible server offering
description: As users flock to Mastodon amid a growing emphasis on decentralization, Cloudflare’s getting in on the action.

title: Malicious Google Ads campaign targets AWS users
description: AWS users are being targeted for their login credentials via phishing sites.

title: Apple just saved Arm-based Windows laptops, and it’s a wakeup call Intel needs
description: Move over Intel and AMD, the age of Arm-based laptops could be here.

title: This Android phone can fully charge from flat in under 10 minutes
description: The incoming Realme GT Neo 5 has a killer feature for the forgetful – an ability to fully recharge in under ten minutes.

title: The Soulsborne games were “the only real obstacle” preventing Armored Core 6
description: Producer of the anticipated Armored Core 6 discussed features and game content.

title: GitHub lays off hundreds of workers, goes fully remote
description: Another tech giant reveals major layoffs, with GitHub seeking to cut costs in other areas too.

title: Windows 11 makes a small but seriously handy change to make your life easier
description: This security tweak is a real-time saver, though it’s only in testing right now.

title: 1Password is to get rid of passwords, with  passkey support on the way
description: 1Password becomes the latest firm to back cutting-edge passwordless technology.

title: Forget the Apple Watch 9, we’re already hearing about the Apple Watch X
description: The Apple Watch X and Apple Watch SE 3 could land in 2024 with bigger screens.

title: Reddit hacked: Criminals steal source data and internal info in cyberattack
description: User data remains safe, and Reddit remains operational, the company confirmed.

title: Oppo’s Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4 rival is going global on February 15
description: The global Oppo Find N2 Flip launch event is set to be held on February 15.

title: Proton gives anyone the chance to secure their files in its encrypted cloud
description: New Proton Drive users can now sign up with an external email to "gradually reduce their exposure to Big Tech’s surveillance infrastructure."

title: Opera may soon get its own version of ChatGPT
description: According to a new report, Opera may be next on the list to receive integration with the popular ChatGPT program.

title: New Intel Raptor Lake mobile CPUs take number-one spot in benchmarks
description: According to recent benchmarks, the latest Intel Raptor Lake mobile CPUs have reclaimed the number one spot over AMD.
